verses.verse: וְנֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> And if a soul כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> now if תֶחֱטָ֗א <S%H2398><s%> sin וְשָֽׁמְעָה֙ <S%H8085><s%> and hear ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice אָלָ֔ה <S%H423><s%> of swearing וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he עֵ֔ד <S%H5707><s%> and [is] a witness א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> whether רָאָ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> he hath seen א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or יָדָ֑ע <S%H3045><s%> or known אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if ל֥וֹא <S%H3808><s%> does not יַגִּ֖יד <S%H5046><s%> [of it] if he do not utter וְנָשָׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> [it] then he shall bear עֲוֹנֽוֹ׃ <S%H5771><s%> his iniquity

א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> Or נֶ֗פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Or if a soul אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> if תִּגַּע֮ <S%H5060><s%> touch בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any דָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> thing טָמֵא֒ <S%H2931><s%> any unclean אוֹ֩ <S%H176><s%> whether בְנִבְלַ֨ת <S%H5038><s%> whether [it be] a carcase חַיָּ֜ה <S%H2416><s%> beast טְמֵאָ֗ה <S%H2931><s%> of an unclean א֤וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בְּנִבְלַת֙ <S%H5038><s%> or a carcase בְּהֵמָ֣ה <S%H929><s%> cattle טְמֵאָ֔ה <S%H2931><s%> of unclean א֕וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בְּנִבְלַ֖ת <S%H5038><s%> or the carcase שֶׁ֣רֶץ <S%H8318><s%> creeping things טָמֵ֑א <S%H2931><s%> of unclean וְנֶעְלַ֣ם <S%H5956><s%> and [if] it be hidden מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> and he טָמֵ֖א <S%H2931><s%> from him he also shall be unclean וְאָשֵֽׁם׃ <S%H816><s%> and guilty

א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> Or כִ֤י <S%H3588><s%> if יִגַּע֙ <S%H5060><s%> Or if he touch בְּטֻמְאַ֣ת <S%H2932><s%> the uncleanness אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> of man לְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> of whatever טֻמְאָת֔וֹ <S%H2932><s%> whatsoever uncleanness אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which יִטְמָ֖א <S%H2930><s%> [it be] that a man shall be defiled בָּ֑הּ וְנֶעְלַ֣ם <S%H5956><s%> withal and it be hid מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יָדַ֖ע <S%H3045><s%> from him when he knoweth וְאָשֵֽׁם׃ <S%H816><s%> [of it] then he shall be guilty

א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> Or נֶ֡פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Or if a soul כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> if תִשָּׁבַע֩ <S%H7650><s%> swear לְבַטֵּ֨א <S%H981><s%> pronouncing בִשְׂפָתַ֜יִם <S%H8193><s%> with [his] lips לְהָרַ֣ע ׀ <S%H7489><s%> to do evil א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or לְהֵיטִ֗יב <S%H3190><s%> or to do good לְ֠כֹל <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after יְבַטֵּ֧א <S%H981><s%> shall pronounce הָאָדָ֛ם <S%H120><s%> whatsoever [it be] that a man בִּשְׁבֻעָ֖ה <S%H7621><s%> with an oath וְנֶעְלַ֣ם <S%H5956><s%> and it be hid מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at וְהוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> he יָדַ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> from him when he knoweth וְאָשֵׁ֖ם <S%H816><s%> [of it] then he shall be guilty לְאַחַ֥ת <S%H259><s%> in one מֵאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> of these

וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become כִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> shall be when יֶאְשַׁ֖ם <S%H816><s%> And it shall be when he shall be guilty לְאַחַ֣ת <S%H259><s%> in one מֵאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> of these וְהִ֨תְוַדָּ֔ה <S%H3034><s%> of these [things] that he shall confess אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which חָטָ֖א <S%H2398><s%> that he hath sinned עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> shall also

וְהֵבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> And he shall bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲשָׁמ֣וֹ <S%H817><s%> his trespass offering לַיהוָ֡ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> his behalf חַטָּאתוֹ֩ <S%H2403><s%> for his sin אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which חָטָ֜א <S%H2398><s%> which he hath sinned נְקֵבָ֨ה <S%H5347><s%> a female מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַצֹּ֥אן <S%H6629><s%> from the flock כִּשְׂבָּ֛ה <S%H3776><s%> a lamb אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or שְׂעִירַ֥ת <S%H8166><s%> or a kid עִזִּ֖ים <S%H5795><s%> of the goats לְחַטָּ֑את <S%H2403><s%> for a sin offering וְכִפֶּ֥ר <S%H3722><s%> shall make an atonement עָלָ֛יו <S%H5921><s%> his behalf הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> and the priest מֵחַטָּאתֽוֹ׃ <S%H2403><s%> for him concerning his sin

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> cannot תַגִּ֣יע <S%H5060><s%> to bring יָדוֹ֮ <S%H3027><s%> And if he דֵּ֣י <S%H1767><s%> be not able שֶׂה֒ <S%H7716><s%> a lamb וְהֵבִ֨יא <S%H935><s%> then he shall bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲשָׁמ֜וֹ <S%H817><s%> his trespass אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which חָטָ֗א <S%H2398><s%> which he hath committed שְׁתֵּ֥י <S%H8147><s%> two תֹרִ֛ים <S%H8449><s%> turtledoves אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> or two בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> young יוֹנָ֖ה <S%H3123><s%> pigeons לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> one לְחַטָּ֖את <S%H2403><s%> for a sin offering וְאֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> and the other לְעֹלָֽה׃ <S%H5930><s%> for a burnt offering

וְהֵבִ֤יא <S%H935><s%> And he shall bring אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> them unto the priest וְהִקְרִ֛יב <S%H7126><s%> who shall offer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לַחַטָּ֖את <S%H2403><s%> [that] which [is] for the sin offering רִאשׁוֹנָ֑ה <S%H7223><s%> first וּמָלַ֧ק <S%H4454><s%> and wring off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֹאשׁ֛וֹ <S%H7218><s%> his head מִמּ֥וּל <S%H4136><s%> from עָרְפּ֖וֹ <S%H6203><s%> his neck וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יַבְדִּֽיל׃ <S%H914><s%> but shall not divide [it] asunder

וְהִזָּ֞ה <S%H5137><s%> And he shall sprinkle מִדַּ֤ם <S%H1818><s%> of the blood הַחַטָּאת֙ <S%H2403><s%> of the sin offering עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on קִ֣יר <S%H7023><s%> upon the side הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar וְהַנִּשְׁאָ֣ר <S%H7604><s%> and the rest בַּדָּ֔ם <S%H1818><s%> of the blood יִמָּצֵ֖ה <S%H4680><s%> shall be wrung out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at יְס֣וֹד <S%H3247><s%> at the bottom הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar חַטָּ֖את <S%H2403><s%> it [is] a sin offering הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשֵּׁנִ֛י <S%H8145><s%> the second יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> And he shall offer עֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> [for] a burnt offering כַּמִּשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> according to the manner וְכִפֶּ֨ר <S%H3722><s%> shall make an atonement עָלָ֧יו <S%H5921><s%> his behalf הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> and the priest מֵחַטָּאת֥וֹ <S%H2403><s%> for him for his sin אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which חָטָ֖א <S%H2398><s%> which he hath sinned וְנִסְלַ֥ח <S%H5545><s%> and it shall be forgiven לֽוֹ׃ ס

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if לֹא֩ <S%H3808><s%> not תַשִּׂ֨יג <S%H5381><s%> be not able to bring יָד֜וֹ <S%H3027><s%> But if he לִשְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> two תֹרִ֗ים <S%H8449><s%> turtledoves אוֹ֮ <S%H176><s%> or לִשְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> or two בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> young יוֹנָה֒ <S%H3123><s%> pigeons וְהֵבִ֨יא <S%H935><s%> shall bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קָרְבָּנ֜וֹ <S%H7133><s%> for his offering אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which חָטָ֗א <S%H2398><s%> then he that sinned עֲשִׂירִ֧ת <S%H6224><s%> the tenth הָאֵפָ֛ה <S%H374><s%> part of an ephah סֹ֖לֶת <S%H5560><s%> of fine flour לְחַטָּ֑את <S%H2403><s%> for a sin offering לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not יָשִׂ֨ים <S%H7760><s%> he shall put עָלֶ֜יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and שֶׁ֗מֶן <S%H8081><s%> no oil וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> or יִתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> upon it neither shall he put עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> and לְבֹנָ֔ה <S%H3828><s%> [any] frankincense כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for חַטָּ֖את <S%H2403><s%> thereon for it [is] a sin offering הִֽיא׃ <S%H1931><s%> He

וֶהֱבִיאָהּ֮ <S%H935><s%> Then shall he bring אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַכֹּהֵן֒ <S%H3548><s%> it to the priest וְקָמַ֣ץ <S%H7061><s%> shall take הַכֹּהֵ֣ן ׀ <S%H3548><s%> and the priest מִ֠מֶּנָּה <S%H4480><s%> at מְל֨וֹא <S%H4393><s%> all along קֻמְצ֜וֹ <S%H7062><s%> handful אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַזְכָּרָתָה֙ <S%H234><s%> of it [even] a memorial וְהִקְטִ֣יר <S%H6999><s%> thereof and burn הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חָה <S%H4196><s%> [it] on the altar עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> with אִשֵּׁ֣י <S%H801><s%> according to the offerings made by fire יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD חַטָּ֖את <S%H2403><s%> it [is] a sin offering הִֽוא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וְכִפֶּר֩ <S%H3722><s%> shall make an atonement עָלָ֨יו <S%H5921><s%> concerning הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning חַטָּאת֧וֹ <S%H2403><s%> for him as touching his sin אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which חָטָ֛א <S%H2398><s%> that he hath sinned מֵֽאַחַ֥ת <S%H259><s%> in one מֵאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> of these וְנִסְלַ֣ח <S%H5545><s%> of these and it shall be forgiven ל֑וֹ וְהָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> shall become לַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> him and [the remnant] shall be the priest's כַּמִּנְחָֽה׃ <S%H4503><s%> as a meat offering ס
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

נֶ֚פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> If a soul כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If תִמְעֹ֣ל <S%H4603><s%> commit מַ֔עַל <S%H4604><s%> a trespass וְחָֽטְאָה֙ <S%H2398><s%> and sin בִּשְׁגָגָ֔ה <S%H7684><s%> through ignorance מִקָּדְשֵׁ֖י <S%H6944><s%> in the holy things יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְהֵבִיא֩ <S%H935><s%> then he shall bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲשָׁמ֨וֹ <S%H817><s%> for his trespass לַֽיהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אַ֧יִל <S%H352><s%> a ram תָּמִ֣ים <S%H8549><s%> without blemish מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> against הַצֹּ֗אן <S%H6629><s%> out of the flocks בְּעֶרְכְּךָ֛ <S%H6187><s%> with thy estimation כֶּֽסֶף־ <S%H3701><s%> of silver שְׁקָלִ֥ים <S%H8255><s%> by shekels בְּשֶֽׁקֶל־ <S%H8255><s%> after the shekel הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> of the sanctuary לְאָשָֽׁם׃ <S%H817><s%> for a trespass offering

וְאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> which חָטָ֨א <S%H2398><s%> for the harm מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> against הַקֹּ֜דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> that he hath done in the holy thing יְשַׁלֵּ֗ם <S%H7999><s%> And he shall make amends וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲמִֽישִׁתוֹ֙ <S%H2549><s%> the fifth part יוֹסֵ֣ף <S%H3254><s%> and shall add עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> of וְנָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> thereto and give אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> לַכֹּהֵ֑ן <S%H3548><s%> it unto the priest וְהַכֹּהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> and the priest יְכַפֵּ֥ר <S%H3722><s%> shall make an atonement עָלָ֛יו <S%H5921><s%> with בְּאֵ֥יל <S%H352><s%> for him with the ram הָאָשָׁ֖ם <S%H817><s%> of the trespass offering וְנִסְלַ֥ח <S%H5545><s%> and it shall be forgiven לֽוֹ׃ פ

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> now if נֶ֙פֶשׁ֙ <S%H5315><s%> And if a soul כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for תֶֽחֱטָ֔א <S%H2398><s%> sin וְעָֽשְׂתָ֗ה <S%H6213><s%> and commit אַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> any מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner מִצְוֹ֣ת <S%H4687><s%> by the commandments יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תֵעָשֶׂ֑ינָה <S%H6213><s%> of these things which are forbidden to be done וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָדַ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> though he wist וְאָשֵׁ֖ם <S%H816><s%> [it] not yet is he guilty וְנָשָׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> and shall bear עֲוֹנֽוֹ׃ <S%H5771><s%> his iniquity

וְ֠הֵבִיא <S%H935><s%> And he shall bring אַ֣יִל <S%H352><s%> a ram תָּמִ֧ים <S%H8549><s%> without blemish מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַצֹּ֛אן <S%H6629><s%> out of the flock בְּעֶרְכְּךָ֥ <S%H6187><s%> with thy estimation לְאָשָׁ֖ם <S%H817><s%> for a trespass offering אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <S%H3548><s%> unto the priest וְכִפֶּר֩ <S%H3722><s%> shall make an atonement עָלָ֨יו <S%H5921><s%> concerning הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> and the priest עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> concerning שִׁגְגָת֧וֹ <S%H7684><s%> for him concerning his ignorance אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which שָׁגָ֛ג <S%H7683><s%> wherein he erred וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and did not יָדַ֖ע <S%H3045><s%> and wist וְנִסְלַ֥ח <S%H5545><s%> [it] not and it shall be forgiven לֽוֹ׃
אָשָׁ֖ם <S%H817><s%> It [is] a trespass offering ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אָשֹׁ֥ם <S%H816><s%> he hath certainly אָשַׁ֖ם <S%H816><s%> trespassed לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD פ
